item.description: Peer-reviewed paper 2023 Hiroki Kanagawa, Takafumi Moriya, Yusuke Ijima, “VC-T: Streaming Voice Conversion Based on Neural Transducer,” Proc. Interspeech 2023, pp. 2088-2092, Aug, 2023 @ Dubrin, Ireland. ICASSP Workshops 2023, pp. 1-5, Jun, 2023 Hiroki Kanagawa and Yusuke Ijima, “Enhancement of Text-Predicting Style Token With Generative Adversarial Network for Expressive Speech Synthesis,” Proc.
